15533333333233333333333332333333311.content:
The Snoringtons: deviantart dot com / matt527cooper / art / Snorington-Third-kisekae-design-827553797

You were pleasantly surprised when you received an invitation from your newest friend, one of the Snorington sisters, to have dinner with them at their house. You had been chatting up with Katie Snorington a few days ago and quickly became fast friends. You and one of your other friends had been riding the bus to your home block when he asked you what your plans were for the evening.

"So whatcha gonna do later tonight?" he asked you.

"Oh, I got a dinner invitation," you replied, "I'm gonna have dinner with Katie's family tonight."

"Wait, Katie?" he asked, "As in, Katie Snorington? Good luck, dude."

"What does that mean?" you asked.

"Rumor has it their entire family has narcolepsy," he replied, "And there's another rumor that when they're not a work, school, or doing basic human things to live, they sleep."

You did hear some crazy rumors surrounding them, but you figured they were just that. Rumors.

"Nah, that can't be true, can it?" you asked, "I mean, I could see one of them having narcolepsy, but all of them?"

"Oh, you think that's crazy?" your friend replied, "Apparently they all snore extremely loudly and drool like waterfalls in their sleep. And they also have extreme flatulence when they sleep and have really smelly feet."

"And you know all of this because..."

"Well...I've never actually seen any of it," your friend said, "Just rumors."

"Yeah, that's what I thought," you replied.

Of course, you would soon find out this was not the case. After you got off the bus, you went to the address Katie gave you and knocked on the door. You opened it and sure enough, it was Katie who answered it. She had her usual blue dress that showed a bit of beer belly and went up to her mid-thighs. She was also barefoot, though you figured that was a given since it was her house.

"Hey!" she excitedly exclaimed, "So glad you could make it!"

"Glad to be here," you replied.

"Come in, come in!" Katie said, grabbing you by the hand and bringing you to the table, where her family had all gathered. Across the table were all the ladies of the Snorington family; they all had the same style dress that showed their legs and big bellies and long black hair. The only real differences were the colors of the dress and their hairstyles. There was the mom Martha (39) in a pink dress, the eldest sister Jenny (19) in a purple dress, Katie of course (18) in her blue dress, Matilda (17) in her red dress, Danielle (15) in her yellow dress, and and Amy (13) in her orange dress. There were two empty chairs there, one of which was for you and, conveniently, next to Katie.

"Nice to meet you," Martha said, "Sorry the boys couldn't be here, Ron and Matt are out camping."

"My dad and brother," Katie replied.

"Nice to meet you all as well," you replied, sitting down next to Katie.

"Hope you have an appetite," Martha said, "There's plenty for everyone."

"Oh believe me, miss," you said, "After the day I've had I've build up an appetite."

So far so good. There was no way any of the rumors about them were true...right?
